title: [LFT] Gold 1 MID/ADC (decayed s3 plat)
body:
Looking for a high gold+ team to start playing competitive with again( Previously played in a plat 4 ranked team on cybergamer)
I am extremely motivated and mature looking for a team to improve into high plat and diamond. 
Looking for a team that also likes to play solo Q during the day or off peak practice times for the team. 
My Mid lane champion pool is diverse with a mixture of AD champions and AP mage champions. 
Mid lane is my preferred choice but i also enjoy playing Marksman/adc and would be happy to slot into that role if i saw the team having a strong top side/ a well knowledge support.

Name: Matt
IGN: Mattelelelel
Age: 21 
Role: 1. mid 2. marksman/adc
Cybergamer thread: http://au.cybergamer.com/forums/thread/557965/Gold-1-LFT-mid-/
Cybergamer profile(achievements in bio):http://au.cybergamer.com/profile/19244/Mattelelelel/

Thanks for taking the time to read :)
